meaningMnemonic: Okayama (岡山) <kanji>Prefecture</kanji> is a prefecture in Japan. Learning the reading will help you to remember the meaning of this word since half of it is in Japanese.
readingMnemonic: The reading is the kun'yomi readings of the first two kanji. Luckily you learned them when you learned the kanji. Then, stick 県 on there and you should be good to go!
